item.description:
Enjoy a scrumptious family style Thai dinner at the well known Amarin Restaurant conviently located at Newton Corner. Total cost including soup, rice, non-alcoholic drink, entrée, tax and tip is a mere $20.00! The menu will be chosen in advance and will include such items as Pad Tai, Duck Choo Cheee, Chicken Cashew, and more.

Event is limited to 20 people to facilitate friendly conversation.

Directions:

Take the Mass Pike to Newton exit 17 and head towards Watertown. Take an immediate left on to Pearl Street to park at the free parking lot behind the restaurant.

PAYPAL NOT ACCEPTED AT THIS EVENT
item.name: Dining Thai style
